languages.text: В темный час в Просторе появились личности, почитаемые святыми. Одного подвижника можно заманить на Фолстоун и тайно убить. Его мощи станут ценной реликвией.

In these dark times, a number of individuals in the Expanse have become known as honoured saints. There is an opportunity to lure one such figure to Foulstone and kill him in secret. His remains will become a valuable relic.
languages.original_text: В темный час в Просторе появились личности, почитаемые святыми. Одного подвижника можно заманить на Фолстоун и тайно убить. Его мощи станут ценной реликвией.

traits.locale_text: In these dark times, a number of individuals in the Expanse have become known as honoured saints. There is an opportunity to lure one such figure to Foulstone and kill him in secret. His remains will become a valuable relic.
The Saint that appeared in this dark hour may be lured into a trap and killed. His remains will become a valuable relic.

In these dark times, a number of individuals in the Expanse have become known as honoured saints. There is an opportunity to lure one such figure to Foulstone and kill him in secret. His remains will become a valuable relic.
The Saint that appeared in this dark hour may be lured into a trap and killed. His remains will become a valuable relic.

In these dark times, a number of individuals in the Expanse have become known as honoured saints. There is an opportunity to lure one such figure to Foulstone and kill him in secret. His remains will become a valuable relic.

In these dark times, a number of individuals in the Expanse have become known as honoured saints. There is an opportunity to lure one such figure to Foulstone and kill him in secret. His remains will become a valuable relic.

languages.text: En ces temps troubles, un certain nombre d'individus des Étendues se sont élevés au rang de saints. Vous avez l'occasion d'attirer l'un d'eux à Rochepeste et de le tuer discrètement. Sa dépouille deviendra une précieuse relique.
languages.original_text: In these dark times, a number of individuals in the Expanse have become known as honoured saints. There is an opportunity to lure one such figure to Foulstone and kill him in secret. His remains will become a valuable relic.

traits.locale_text: En ces temps troubles, un certain nombre d'individus des Étendues se sont élevés au rang de saints. Vous avez l'occasion d'attirer l'un d'eux à Rochepeste et de le tuer discrètement. Sa dépouille deviendra une précieuse relique.

languages.text: この暗黒時代には、エクスパンスで名誉ある聖人として有名になった人物が何人もいる。そのような人物をファウルストーンに誘い込み、裏で殺すことが可能だ。その遺体は貴重な遺物となるだろう。
languages.original_text: In these dark times, a number of individuals in the Expanse have become known as honoured saints. There is an opportunity to lure one such figure to Foulstone and kill him in secret. His remains will become a valuable relic.

traits.locale_text: この暗黒時代には、エクスパンスで名誉ある聖人として有名になった人物が何人もいる。そのような人物をファウルストーンに誘い込み、裏で殺すことが可能だ。その遺体は貴重な遺物となるだろう。

languages.text: 在这至暗的时刻，科罗努斯扩区一部分名闻遐迩的人被众人称之为圣徒。现在，我们有机会将其中一位圣徒引诱到荒寂岩地，之后将其秘密杀害。这位圣徒的遗体将会成为贵重的圣物。
languages.original_text: In these dark times, a number of individuals in the Expanse have become known as honoured saints. There is an opportunity to lure one such figure to Foulstone and kill him in secret. His remains will become a valuable relic.

traits.locale_text: 在这至暗的时刻，科罗努斯扩区一部分名闻遐迩的人被众人称之为圣徒。现在，我们有机会将其中一位圣徒引诱到荒寂岩地，之后将其秘密杀害。这位圣徒的遗体将会成为贵重的圣物。

languages.text: En estos tiempos oscuros que corren, una serie de individuos de la Extensión han pasado a ser considerados santos. Existe la oportunidad de atraer a uno de ellos a Rocainmunda y matarlo en secreto. Sus restos serán una valiosa reliquia.
languages.original_text: In these dark times, a number of individuals in the Expanse have become known as honoured saints. There is an opportunity to lure one such figure to Foulstone and kill him in secret. His remains will become a valuable relic.

traits.locale_text: En estos tiempos oscuros que corren, una serie de individuos de la Extensión han pasado a ser considerados santos. Existe la oportunidad de atraer a uno de ellos a Rocainmunda y matarlo en secreto. Sus restos serán una valiosa reliquia.

languages.text: In diesen dunklen Zeiten haben sich einige Personen in der Ausdehnung einen Namen als angesehene Heilige gemacht. Es bietet sich die Gelegenheit, einen dieser Heiligen nach Foulstone zu locken und heimlich zu töten. Seine Überreste werden zu einer wertvollen Reliquie werden.
languages.original_text: In these dark times, a number of individuals in the Expanse have become known as honoured saints. There is an opportunity to lure one such figure to Foulstone and kill him in secret. His remains will become a valuable relic.

traits.locale_text: In diesen dunklen Zeiten haben sich einige Personen in der Ausdehnung einen Namen als angesehene Heilige gemacht. Es bietet sich die Gelegenheit, einen dieser Heiligen nach Foulstone zu locken und heimlich zu töten. Seine Überreste werden zu einer wertvollen Reliquie werden.

languages.text: Şu kara günlerde Enginlik'te birkaç kişi muhterem azizler olarak kendini gösterdi. Bunlardan birini Menfurtaş'a çekip gizlice öldürme fırsatı doğmuş durumda. Zatın naaşı, kıymetli bir yâdigar olacaktır.
languages.original_text: In these dark times, a number of individuals in the Expanse have become known as honoured saints. There is an opportunity to lure one such figure to Foulstone and kill him in secret. His remains will become a valuable relic.
